references.paper_title: Drag your GAN: Interactive point-based manipulation on the generative image manifold
references.reason: This paper introduces the drag-based editing task, which LucidDrag directly addresses and improves upon, thus significantly impacting the field of image manipulation.

references.paper_title: DragonDiffusion: Enabling drag-style manipulation on diffusion models
references.reason: This work directly inspires LucidDrag's approach, introducing the concept of classifier guidance for image editing within diffusion models and serving as a strong baseline for comparison.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces a key image generation model used in LucidDrag, providing the foundation for high-quality image generation which is a critical component of the proposed method.
